text: Beauvoir-Wavans is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region in northern France. ==Geography== A village located 33 miles (52 km) southwest of Arras at the junction of the D117 with the D938 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * Two churches dedicated to St. Vaast, from the sixteenth century and the 17th century. * The Château de Beauvoir-Rivière, built in 1780. * The World War I cemetery. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas- de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * The CWGC cemetery at Wavans Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Beauvoir-Wavans
